PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) ? International Centre for Theoretical Physics (ICTP) award. Number 5512.NI.H8
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Award was to support the PhD thesis work. The purpose of this work was to verify the hypothesis that homogeneous association of highly carboxymethylated chitosans and calcium phosphate might promote not only the formation of bone tissue but also its mineralization. Role: PI
